attributes.action: employ real police officers not c.s.o
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
over the last year i have seen more and more c.s.o on beat and i am not impressed i believe they recieve the same basic pay as a police officer in the first year what a waste of public money and what has happened to specials and traffic wardens.
there is talk of giving them more powers big mistake, this is the government way of saying they have put more uniforms on the streets rubbish they would have been better putting the boy scouts at least they are prepared.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
